input.sentences: at the party | the woman could not wait to tell her friend a secret .
other friends at the party acted silly for the camera .
the party gave two friends a chance to catch up on what was happening in their lives .
the woman had a great story to tell her friend | complete with gestures !
by the end of the night | one party goer had to rest and show off .
output.sentences: There's nothing quite like a candid, unexpected photo taken of you while having a fun night with friends.
Especially when you're a little too intoxicated to remember flipping off the camera and singing to a song you don't know all of the words to.
While dancing around with your pals, you don't expect to be photographed for every break dance move you make.
When you realize you're being photographed, you either smile for the camera or beg them to stop.
But, sometimes, you just decide to take a picture right back!
